title: Strings and integers
postscript: Strings are case sensitive, which means "Swift" is not the same string as "swift".
question: Which code creates an integer?
hint: Swift gives variables the string type when their values are enclosed in quotes, regardless of what the value is.

wrong.reason: Even though this has a number inside the quotes, this still creates a string.
